title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS & GenAI Power CDG's Telecom Software Modernization Journey (SMB202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS与生成式AI助力CDG电信软件现代化之旅 (SMB202)
abstract: Learn how AWS transformed a telecommunications software business in an era where reliable broadband connectivity is essential to daily life. Through AWS Enterprise Support and the Partner Program, Communications Data Group (CDG) achieved 100% year-over-year growth while modernizing solutions for telecom operators. AWS's 24/7 technical support and expertise in cloud architecture, generative AI, and business intelligence enabled CDG's next-generation platform. The session shows how CDG improved efficiency, demonstrating how AWS helps providers scale, manage costs, and enhance customer experiences.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何在可靠的宽带连接对日常生活至关重要的时代转型一家电信软件企业。通过AWS企业支持和合作伙伴计划，Communications Data Group (CDG) 实现了100%的同比增长，同时为电信运营商提供现代化解决方案。AWS的全天候技术支持以及在云架构、生成式AI和商业智能方面的专业知识，助力CDG打造下一代平台。该案例展示了CDG如何提高效率，演示了AWS如何帮助服务提供商实现规模化、管理成本并提升客户体验。
